title: Track Shipment by PRO Number
description: A clerk needs to find the status of an LTL shipment using the carrier's progressive (PRO) number.

tasks.description: Enter the carrier's PRO number into the tracking system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly inputs the PRO number.

tasks.description: The system identifies the carrier associated with the PRO number format.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system correctly determines the PRO number belongs to 'XPO Logistics'.

tasks.description: Query the identified carrier's API for tracking information using the PRO number.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system retrieves the latest tracking status, 'In Transit to Destination Terminal'.
